newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - UBS on Lousiana Land, Burlington.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - UBS on Lousiana Land, Burlington.

text.p: UBS Securities said analyst Michael Barbis downgraded both Louisiana Land and Exploration Co and Burlington Resources Inc to hold from buy following the proposed merger between the two companies.
-- said in report "strategically we like the fit of the Burlington/Louisiana Land merger."
-- said Burlington increases exposure to oil.
-- said deal was "an expensive price to pay for LLX. Burlington has obviously factored in a substantial amount of upside associated with LLX's vast Gulf of Mexico acreage position."
